signals: Hulu is known for its distinct green branding.

audienceSignals: Partners and vendors working with Hulu's brand assets

valueProps.text: Hulu's brand is flexible enough to work across the entire Hulu ecosystem.

pains: Need for consistent brand application across various platforms
proof: Hulu's distinct green color is a recognizable brand element.

facts.text: Hulu's primary brand color is green.
facts.evidence: Hulu green is our primary brand color.
Black is our secondary color and is used over green.

facts.text: Hulu's brand is defined by traits that are flexible and pioneering.
facts.evidence: Our brand is defined by these traits that we put into action across all our campaigns and channels.

facts.text: Hulu's brand guidelines are designed to help partners bring the brand to life.
facts.evidence: We've created a set of guidelines to help you bring our brand to life.

facts.text: The Hulu logo should be green whenever possible.
facts.evidence: Whenever possible, the Hulu logo should be green.

facts.text: Hulu uses the Graphik type family in all applications.
facts.evidence: Hulu uses the Graphik type family in all applications.

facts.text: Hulu's iconography is part of its emotive and navigational language.
facts.evidence: Icons are part our emotive and navigational language.

facts.text: The Vessel is a visual metaphor for TV, redefining what TV is.
facts.evidence: The Vessel is a visual metaphor for TV, redefining what TV is.

facts.text: Hulu's grid system is simple and flexible, working across all platforms.
facts.evidence: A simple, flexible system that brings Hulu together on every platform.

facts.text: Hulu's illustration style builds off the shape of the Vessel.
facts.evidence: Our illustration style builds off the shape of the Vessel.
